price: Tazama vipi wanavyo kupigia mifano. Basi wamepotea. Kwa hivyo hawawezi kuipata njia.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: Hebu angalia vipi walivyo kushabihisha; wamekushabihisha na mtu aliye rogwa, na wakakuita kohani, mtunga mashairi, wakaipotea njia ya hoja. Kwa hivyo wasiweze kupata njia ya kuzua tusi linalo kubalika, au kwa hivyo wakaukosa uwongofu, na wasiipate njia ya kuufikilia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
